participant_1.background:
I grew up homeschooled.
I have a hard time feeling connected with people.
I sometimes need to scream to feel alive.
I care deeply about animals.
I take my emotions out through art.

participant_2.background:
I am a student.
I am an only child.
I have a pet dog.
My favorite food is pizza.

content.text: What kind of art do you like?
I like all kinds of art, but I especially like paintings and sculptures.
Me too! I love how paintings can capture a moment in time and sculptures can bring a piece of nature or history to life.
I know what you mean! I love how art can make you feel something, whether it's happy, sad, or anything in between.
Me too! It's amazing how something that doesn't have any words can communicate so much.
It really is! I think art is one of the most powerful things in the world.
I agree! It can make people think about things in new ways and see the world differently.
I think that's why I'm so drawn to it. It's a way for me to express myself and to connect with others.
That's a beautiful way to put it. I'm glad you're able to use art to connect with people.
Thanks! Me too. It's been a really important part of my life.
It sounds like it! I'm glad to hear that.
